item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Crypto rebounds after Trump TACO’s on Tariffs! BitGo $2.1B IPO! Solana’s SKR token soars 250% FDV!
item.description: Crypto majors are green and rebounding after Trump pivoted on EU tariffs; BTC +2% at $89,900; ETH +2% at $2,995, SOL +2% at $130; XRP +3% to $1.94. CC (+15%), SKY (+11%) and SAND (+10%) led top movers. Crypto markets saw more than $1B in liquidations as Bitcoin rebounded sharply after President Trump signaled a retreat from proposed tariff measures. Vitalik Buterin proposed native DVT staking to strengthen Ethereum security and decentralization, signaling continued protocol-level experimentation. Bitgo announced its IPO at $18 per share, valuing it at ~$2B. The Senate Ag Committee confirmed that its version of the Clarity Act will move forward to markup next week despite lack of bipartisan support. Mortgage lender Newrez explored counting Bitcoin and Ethereum toward mortgage qualification, applying discounted valuations to account for crypto volatility. Hong Kong regulators moved to issue stablecoin licenses under a new framework that imposes strict compliance, reserve, and operational requirements. Russian courts ruled that cryptocurrencies qualify as property under law, setting a legal precedent for future criminal and civil cases. President Trump said he hopes to sign the crypto market structure bill soon, despite ongoing legislative roadblocks and disagreements over regulatory scope. Saga’s EVM blockchain halted operations following a $7M hack, with stolen funds bridged to Ethereum. Steak ’n Shake rolled out a Bitcoin bonus program for hourly employees, allowing workers to earn a portion of compensation in BTC.

item.title: Strategy, Bitmine : les Crypto Treasury Companies défient le bear market
item.description: Malgré la baisse du marché, les plus grandes Crypto Treasury Companies du monde continuent d'accumuler des tokens. C'est le cas de Strategy, l'entreprise de Michael Saylor, première Bitcoin Treasury au monde.

item.title: Trump sues JPMorgan for $5B! Ledger prepares for $4B IPO! “Crypto Adoption is no longer reversible” says PWC!
item.description: Crypto majors are red while Gold nears $5,000 and Silver closes in on $100; BTC -1% at $89,100; ETH -2% at $2,925, SOL -2% at $127; XRP -2% to $1.90. ZRO (+15%), AXS (+10%) and DASH (+8%) led top movers. Ledger is preparing for a $4B IPO, enlisting Goldman Sachs, Jefferies and Barclays for support. Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse predicted crypto could hit new highs in 2026, pointing to regulatory momentum and institutional participation as key drivers. President Trump sued JPMorgan for $5 billion, alleging politically motivated “debanking”. BitGo briefly surged in its stock market debut before finishing its first day of trading just over its $18 IPO price. BlackRock CEO Larry Fink pushed the idea of a single blockchain for tokenization to avoid corruption and aid in scaling. Kansas introduced its own Bitcoin Strategic Reserve bill. PwC said institutional crypto adoption has crossed a point of no return, as regulatory frameworks move from draft rules toward active supervision. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent reaffirmed the Trump administration’s push for U.S. crypto leadership and support for a strategic Bitcoin reserve.

item.title: ZEC Rebounds 11%! Trump says he won’t pardon Sam Bankman-Fried! Florida revisits it’s Strategic Bitcoin Reserve!
item.description: Crypto majors are mostly flat ahead of today’s supreme court opinion on the trump tariffs; btc +1% at $90,300; eth 13% at $3,090, sol +3% at $138; xrp +1% to $2.10. Polygon (+11%), zec (+11%) and syrup (+7%) led top movers. Jpmorgan said the recent bitcoin and ethereum sell-off may be bottoming, pointing to improving positioning and easing downside pressure after early-year weakness. Bank of america analysts upgraded coinbase to buy, citing improved regulatory clarity, growing institutional adoption, and stronger long-term earnings visibility. Morgan stanley is planning to launch a digital wallet later this year that could support tokenized assets, including private company equity. Florida lawmakers renewed their push for a state-level bitcoin reserve. Ethereum’s validator exit queue fully cleared, easing delays that had impacted liquid staking protocols and validator withdrawals. Polygon labs unveiled the open money stack, an initiative designed to streamline stablecoin payments. Polygon is reportedly close to acquiring coinme, a major bitcoin atm operator. Trump said that he won’t pardon ftx founder sam bankman-fried.

item.title: Crypto starts 2026 STRONG! Venezuela Impacts on the market! Lighter TGE reactions!
item.description: The global crypto market cap pushed another 2% to $3.22T as majors continue to grind up; BTC +1% at $93,780; ETH +2% at $3,240, SOL +3% at $139; XRP led up 12% to $2.37 RENDER (+18%), SUI (+18%) and LIT (+15%) led top movers. Bank of America formally launched its crypto recommendations for wealth clients with up to 4% portfolio allocation. Morgan Stanley filed for a Solana Trust with the SEC. Goldman Sachs upgraded Coinbase to a ‘Buy’ rating today while simultaneously downgrading eToro. Japan’s finance minister endorsed deeper crypto integration, including lower taxes and exchange-level reforms. Vitalik Buterin claimed Ethereum has effectively solved the “Blockchain Trilemma” by balancing decentralization and scalability through its Layer-2 roadmap. Kraken is investigating reports that customer data is allegedly for sale on the dark web following a potential security exploit. Ledger users are on high alert as the hardware wallet provider faces a data breach involving its e-commerce partner, Global-E, exposing customer contact details.

item.title: Après plus de 50 % de chute depuis l'ATH, les ETF Bitcoin tombent sous le niveau d'avant l'élection de Donald Trump
item.description: Affichant désormais moins de 90 milliards de dollars de valeur d'actifs sous gestion, les ETF Bitcoin ont effacé leur progression depuis la victoire de Donald Trump. Lumière sur cette chute spectaculaire depuis leurs records.

item.title: Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon reveals he owns ‘very little’ amount of bitcoin
item.description: This is the first time Solomon has said he owns the cryptocurrency, something he previusly said could be "a store of value case."

item.title: La sécurité des protocoles DeFi est-elle compromise par la généralisation du « vibe coding » ?
item.description: La sécurité des protocoles de la DeFi s’impose depuis de nombreuses années comme un enjeu majeur pour leur adoption à plus grande échelle. Une exigence qui se heurte à de nombreux hacks à répétition, et que l’utilisation de plus en plus importante de l’IA pour écrire leur code ne risque pas d’arranger, comme dans le récent cas de Moonwell.

item.title: Crypto : Peter Thiel tourne le dos à la trésorerie Ethereum
item.description: Le pari “Ethereum en Bourse” vient de perdre son le plus bruyant. Peter Thiel et des entités liées à Founders Fund ont cédé l’intégralité de leur participation dans ETHZilla, selon un formulaire 13G déposé auprès de la SEC.

item.title: SocGen's FORGE expands euro stablecoin to XRP Ledger in multi-chain push
item.description: The French banking group’s digital asset unit deploys EUR CoinVertible on a third public blockchain, alongside Ethereum and Solana.

item.title: Goldman Sachs CEO Owns 'Very Little' Bitcoin, Backs Bessent on Clarity Act
item.description: Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon backed Treasury Secretary Bessent, who recently had harsh words for companies like Coinbase that said no crypto legislation is better “than a bad bill.”

item.title: Bitcoin volatile, but flat, while crypto stocks bounce amid cooling AI fears
item.description: Coinbase, Circle, Galaxy, IREN and Riot led the early morning rebound among crypto-related stocks as the battered software sector found some relief.

item.title: Bitcoin : le mini-marché baissier touche déjà à sa fin ? Ce rapport de K33 Research le pense
item.description: Le marché de Bitcoin et des cryptomonnaies a montré des signes qu'il pourrait avoir atteint son point le plus bas selon K33 Research.

item.title: Hyperliquid starts DeFi lobbying group with $29 million token backing
item.description: Jake Chervinsky, CEO of the Hyperliquid Policy Center, said markets are migrating to blockchain, and the U.S. need to adopt new rules of risk being left behind.

item.title: Ethereum soldé à -99,9% : un oracle DeFi défaillant fait chuter le prix de l’ETH à 1,12 $ !
item.description: Moonwell a été victime d'une erreur d'oracle qui a conduit à une décorrélation du prix d'Ethereum (ou plus précisément du cbETH) à 1,12 $ !

item.title: From 2016 hack to $150M Endowment: the DAO’s second act focuses on Ethereum security
item.description: Ten years after the famous hack, the DAO Security Fund has decided to stake the untouched ETH and use the yield to fund Ethereum security initiatives, honor claims indefinitely, and professionalize governance and key management.

item.title: BlackRock achète plus d'ETH pour préparer son ETF avec staking
item.description: BlackRock passe à l’offensive sur Ethereum avec l’ETHB, un ETF combinant exposition à l’ETH et staking. Le gestionnaire a acheté 100 000 dollars de la 2e cryptomonnaie du marché, afin de financer les premiers volumes du fonds.

item.title: Bitcoin ETFs log $105M outflows as mystery IBIT buyer surfaces
item.description: US spot Bitcoin ETFs continue to see slowing outflows as investors and analysts examine Q4 2025 filings showing which institutions bought and sold crypto ETFs.

item.title: Strategy et Bitmine continuent de renforcer leurs portefeuilles en Bitcoin et en ETH malgré la volatilité
item.description: Tandis que le marché crypto traverse une phase de correction brutale, certaines entreprises cotées choisissent de renforcer leurs positions plutôt que de réduire la voilure. En pleine volatilité, Strategy et Bitmine Immersion Technologies augmentent leurs réserves de Bitcoin et d’Ether, malgré un climat boursier défavorable. Ce contraste interpelle alors que les cours reculent et que les actions liées aux cryptos plongent, ces sociétés intensifient leur exposition.

item.title: Bitcoin : Dans les coulisses des 85 milliards de dollars en ETF crypto
item.description: Au-delà de l'apparente résilience des ETF Bitcoin spot aux US, Markus Thielen souligne le rôle prépondérant des market makers.

item.title: Le Bitcoin vacille : La volatilité US menace le support des 70 000 $
item.description: Le seuil des 70 000 dollars n’a pas tenu. Dans un climat de forte volatilité aux États-Unis, le bitcoin encaisse de plein fouet le retour de l’instabilité sur les marchés traditionnels. Rendements obligataires sous tension, indice de volatilité en hausse, aversion au risque marquée : le décor macroéconomique se durcit. Cette séquence dépasse la simple correction technique. Elle illustre la dépendance croissante du bitcoin aux dynamiques financières globales. Ainsi, le marché crypto peut-il encore s’affranchir des cycles macroéconomiques ?

item.title: États-Unis : 121 milliards de dollars de remboursements fiscaux attendus, quel impact sur le Bitcoin ?
item.description: Le gouvernement américain s'apprête à redistribuer environ 121 milliards de dollars à ses contribuables en 2026, selon le Joint Committee on Taxation. Cette somme se décompose en 91 milliards de remboursements fiscaux directs entre février et avril, et 30 milliards de réductions de prélèvements à la source étalés sur l'année. De quoi se poser la question : cela aura-t-il un effet sur les investissements ?

item.title: Tom Lee Expects 'Defining Year for Ethereum' as BitMine Buys ETH Amid 'Rock Bottom' Vibes
item.description: BitMine Immersion Technologies is sitting on a nearly $8 billion unrealized loss, but Tom Lee remains optimistic about Ethereum.

item.title: La tokenisation de l'or pourrait-elle atteindre 15 milliards de dollars cette année ?
item.description: Alors que les cryptomonnaies entrent dans les sphères financières traditionnelles, l’or prend pour sa part le chemin de la blockchain à l’aide du principe de tokenisation. Une activité de trading désormais disponible de gré à gré pour les institutionnels via Wintermute, pour les tokens PAXG et XAUT.

item.title: Jusqu'à 80 $ en Bitcoin offerts en achetant un wallet crypto Ledger
item.description: Jusqu'à 80 $ en Bitcoin offerts en achetant un wallet crypto Ledger

item.title: Il faudra s'armer de patience avant de voir le Bitcoin repartir en tendance haussière
item.description: Le Bitcoin se trouve actuellement dans une situation compliquée, avec un prix qui oscille dangereusement sous le niveau des 70 000 dollars. Une tendance baissière qui pourrait bien être amenée à durer dans le temps, en particulier car l’économie reste paradoxalement assez stable.

item.title: Steak 'n Shake Says Bitcoin Has Lifted Sales 'Dramatically' in 9 Months
item.description: The fast-food chain says bitcoin payments have boosted sales, as it channels crypto receipts into a growing corporate reserve.

item.title: Trump’s speech at Davos gives small boost to Crypto! Saylor buys $2.13B BTC! Blondish Interview!
item.description: Crypto majors are very red following a red Tuesday across markets; BTC -3% at $88,200; ETH -6% at $2,905, SOL -2% at $127; XRP -2% to $1.88. MYX (+11%) and ZRO (+10%) led top movers. Bitcoin and Solana both fell below key technical support levels as selling pressure accelerated. Over $1B in longs were liquidated during Bitcoin’s slide below $88k. Delaware Life added Bitcoin exposure to a fixed indexed annuity by linking performance to BlackRock’s spot BTC ETF, one of the first big moves to expand crypto access inside traditional insurance products. Trump Media announced plans to airdrop crypto tokens to shareholders in February, marking its first onchain incentive tied directly to equity ownership. Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong traveled to Davos to push for a “win-win” U.S. crypto market structure bill amid renewed regulatory momentum. Portugal’s gambling regulator blocked access to Polymarket, citing unlicensed gambling concerns as prediction markets face mounting global scrutiny. The CFTC warned it is underprepared to take on a broader crypto oversight role, as the agency faces staffing shortages after a roughly 21.5% workforce reduction. Galaxy Digital announced plans for a $100M hedge fund targeting crypto and fintech. World Liberty Fi announced its first annual form at Mar-A-Lago on Feb 18.

item.title: Trump Tariffs 3: Return of the Bull Market! NYSE Tokenising, what that means for $Hype! Claude Meme Meta!
item.description: Crypto majors are red following Trump’s tariff turmoil; BTC -2% at $91,100; ETH -4% at $3,105, SOL -3% at $129; XRP -2% to $1.93. CC (+12%), MYX (+5%) and SYRUP (+4%) led top movers. The NYSE began preparations for 24/7 tokenized stock and ETF trading. Steak ’n Shake revealed roughly $10M in Bitcoin exposure alongside the creation of a corporate BTC strategic reserve. Vitalik Buterin called for more sophisticated DAO governance models to improve accountability, coordination, and long-term sustainability. Bermuda outlined plans for a fully onchain national economy, working with Coinbase and Circle on payments, identity, and tokenized financial infrastructure. In Corporate Treasuries / ETFs. The BTC ETFs saw $394M in net outflows on Friday breaking a 4-day inflow streak; ETH ETFs stayed green with $4.7M in inflows. In Memes / Onchain Movers. Meme majors were red along with majors; Doge -1%, Shiba -1%, PEPE -2%, TRUMP -1%, Bonk -1%, Pengu -4%, SPX -12%, WIF -1% and Fartcoin -8%. USOR (+70%), GSD (+50%), and Eliza Town (+800%) led onchain movers.

item.title: Massive Coinbase News! Bitcoin Rips to $96,750! Football.Fun TGE Interview with Founder!
item.description: Crypto majors are very green with Bitcoin making a new another 2-month high; BTC +2% at $96,7500; ETH +2% at $3,360, SOL even at $145; XRP -1% to $2.11. DCR (+30%), DASH (+10%), ICP (+10%) and ZEC (+7%) led top movers; XMR hit another new ATH at $800 before retracing to $725. Coinbase pulled support for the Senate’s crypto market structure bill ahead of a key vote, citing major concerns with the latest draft, leading to the Senate delaying the bill. Zcash avoided SEC action after the Zcash Foundation said the agency’s investigation has concluded. Ripple secured a Luxembourg license as its European expansion continued. Pakistan teamed with World Liberty Financial to explore stablecoin use cases for remittances and cross-border payments. The Human Rights Foundation awarded nearly $1.3M in Bitcoin grants to projects tied to human rights and freedom tech. Figure unveiled a new public equity network designed to enable on-chain issuance of stocks and related assets. FTX prepared another round of creditor payments and outlined timing details for the next distribution on March 31. Sui came back online after a nearly six-hour network stall, marking another reliability test for the chain.

item.title: A16z raise $15B! Jerome Powell vs Trump! Crypto remains flat! Special Guest: Dudas!
item.description: Crypto majors are mostly flat headed into Monday open; btc even at $90,600; eth +1% at $3,110, sol +2% at $140; xrp -2% to $2.04. Ip (+20%) and xmr (+15%) led top movers; xmr hit a new ath at $590. Fed chair Jerome Powell released a video message claiming that the criminal charges he faces are due to his not cutting interest rates in line with Trump’s wishes. X (twitter) announced plans for “smart cashtags” to show crypto and stock prices live next to tickers. Vaneck projected bitcoin could reach $53m by 2050, outlining long-term adoption, trade settlement and store-of-value assumptions driving 29% annual growth. Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) raised $15b to fund American Dynanism, with ai and crypto at the forefront. Ripple received FCA approval to scale crypto payments in the uk. Bny mellon debuted tokenized deposits for institutional and digital-native clients. A new house bill would bar lawmakers and federal officials from using prediction markets. Tether froze $182m in usdt linked to Venezuela oil trades.

item.title: First 2026 Dip! BTC at 92K! Morgan Stanley file for BTC, ETH & SOL ETFs! Hyperliquid Airdrop Speculation!
item.description: Crypto majors fall for first time in 2026; BTC at $92k. Morgan Stanley files for BTC, ETH and SOL ETFs. US Senate schedules key vote for crypto market structure bill for next week. Hyperliquid releases progress map, leads to speculation of next airdrop. Nike announced it has sold off RTFKT; Clone X jump 250%. Crypto majors fell yesterday for the first time in 2026; BTC 2% at $92,000; ETH -1% at $3,210, SOL -1% at $138; XRP. 5% to $2.24. The U.S. Senate Banking Committee scheduled a key vote on the crypto market-structure bill next week. Ethereum network usage hit record daily transactions (2M+). Telegram shared that it sold $450M of its TON over the course of last year.

item.title: 2026 Crypto Predictions! Tom Lee still buying ETH! Rekt tease WorldStar collab!
item.description: Btc: 87k (0%) | btc.D: 59.0% (0%). Eth: 2975 (1%) | bnb: 855 (+1%) | sol: 124 (0%). Tom Lee bought another $130M in ETH for Christmas, and still holds $1B in cash heading into the new year. REKT drinks and WorldStarHipHop tease collab. BlackRock’s BUIDL hits $100M million in dividends and passes $2 billion in assets. Metaplanet buys 4,279 bitcoin, lifts total holdings to 35,102 BTC. Unleash Protocol hit by $3.9 million exploit with funds routed through Tornado Cash. Onchain Perpetuals Top $1T Monthly Volume as Crypto Traders Chase Leverage. South Korea’s Crypto Regulation Delayed as Stablecoin Rules Face Deadlock. Abundant Mining CEO says Bitcoin price volatility hasn’t slowed mining demand.

item.title: Real estate billionaire Barry Sternlicht is ready to tokenize assets, but says U.S. regulation blocks it
item.description: The $125 billion real estate firm wants to offer blockchain-based tokens to clients but is stalled by regulation.

item.title: Ledn sells $188 million worth of bitcoin-backed bonds: Bloomberg
item.description: S&P Global gave the majority of the bonds the less-than-stellar rating of BBB-, according to a Feb. 9 report.

item.title: Can AI Agents Boost Ethereum Security? OpenAI and Paradigm Created a Testing Ground
item.description: OpenAI and Paradigm launched EVMbench, a tool that tests how capable AI agents are at finding and fixing smart contract vulnerabilities.

item.title: Kraken acquires tokenization platform Magna ahead of potential IPO
item.description: The crypto exchange's parent company acquired several platforms in 2025 while confidentially filing for an initial public offering with the SEC.

item.title: Bitcoin Miner Riot Must Embrace $21 Billion AI Opportunity, Says Activist Investor
item.description: An activist investor said Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms needs a "renewed sense of urgency" in order to capitalize on the major AI opportunity.

item.title: Peter Thiel Exits ETHZilla Investment After Ethereum Treasury Stock Craters
item.description: Billionaire investor Peter Thiel and Founders Fund held a 7.5% stake in Ethereum treasury company ETHZilla last year—but not anymore.

item.title: $209B exited altcoins over the last 13 months: Did traders rotate into Bitcoin?
item.description: Net selling from altcoins topped $209 billion, far outpacing the sell volumes seen during Bitcoin's five-month sell-off. Will these traders reposition into Bitcoin?

item.title: La BCE structure son euro numérique avec un pilote prévu en 2027
item.description: L’euro numérique sort du laboratoire pour entrer dans le concret. La Banque centrale européenne fixe désormais un calendrier précis : sélection des prestataires de services de paiement dès 2026, puis lancement d’un pilote d’un an en 2027. Après des années d’études et de consultations, le projet franchit un cap opérationnel. Derrière ces échéances se dessine une ambition globale : inscrire durablement l’euro numérique au cœur du système de paiement européen et redéfinir l’équilibre des forces dans la zone euro.

item.title: Ether.fi shifts non-custodial crypto card product to OP Mainnet from Scroll
item.description: Ether.fi will migrate roughly "70,000 active cards, 300,000 accounts, and millions in user TVL to Optimism," over the coming months.

item.title: Bitcoin sinks to $66,000, U.S. stocks lose steam as Fed minutes mention possible rate hike
item.description: Bitcoin is now on track for its fifth consecutive weekly decline, and losing this level could open the floor for a fresh leg lower.

item.title: DerivaDEX launches Bermuda-licensed derivatives exchange under DAO governance
item.description: The decentralized exchange has begun offering crypto perpetual swaps after receiving a test license from Bermuda’s regulator, operating under DAO governance and formal oversight.

item.title: Coinbase-Backed Ethereum Network Base to Dump Optimism Tech as Potential Token Looms
item.description: Ethereum layer-2 network Base is leaving behind the Optimism technology stack as it seeks faster upgrades and reduced overhead.

item.title: Ether 'bear pennant' puts target on $1.1K ETH price: Here’s why
item.description: Ethereum onchain data and a bear pennant on the daily chart suggest that bears may target the $1,100 level. Would a dip to that zone represent a generational buy opportunity?

item.title: L'euro numérique souhaite « préserver la position centrale des banques » face à l'émergence des stablecoins
item.description: La mise en place de l’euro numérique se précise, avec l’annonce d’un projet pilote pour 2027 qui implique une sélection en amont des prestataires de paiement qui y participeront. Dans le même temps, un membre de la BCE assure qu’il servira à protéger les banques de la zone euro face aux stablecoins et « autres solutions privées ».

item.title: OpenAI and Paradigm partner on AI agent tool for smart contract security
item.description: DeFi lending protocol Moonwell and CrossCurve have both recently suffered exploits connected to smart contracts.

item.title: Sam Altman's OpenAI unveils ‘EVMbench’ to test whether AI can keep crypto’s smart contracts safe
item.description: Developed with Paradigm, the tool is OpenAI’s attempt to determine whether modern AI systems are up to the task of helping prevent smart contract issues.

item.title: Bitcoin et dollar fragiles, mais l’or et le SP 500 pourraient accélérer ! Le Point Macro
item.description: Les capitaux pourraient continuer à se déverser vers l'or et le S&P 500. Mais le Bitcoin et le dollar sont boudés par les investisseurs.

item.title: Price predictions 2/18: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, BCH, ADA, HYPE, XMR
item.description: Technical charts show Bitcoin price hanging on to softening support in the $68,000 to $65,000 zone, and a breakdown below the level could usher in new lows in the $50,000 range.

item.title: World Liberty Forum opens with 18% WLFI rally as Eric Trump says crypto industry still at ‘one-yard line’
item.description: Apex Group plans to test USD1's stablecoin infrastructure within traditional fund administration, aiming to speed settlement for tokenized assets.

item.title: Treasury bills seen as primary driver of Bitcoin's price: Report
item.description: New Keyrock research finds not all newly created money impacts risk assets due to how fresh liquidity flows through the economy.

item.title: Canary, Grayscale Sui ETFs Hit US Markets With Staking Rewards
item.description: The first Sui ETFs are now trading as Canary and Grayscale bring staking-enabled crypto exposure to traditional markets.

item.title: The Protocol: Zora moves to Solana
item.description: Also: EF’s Stańczak to leave ED role, XRPL member-only DEX and Ethereum revives the DAO.

item.title: The Daily: Peter Thiel and Founders Fund exit ETHZilla, K33 says bitcoin is approaching ‘late bear market territory,’ and more
item.description: The Daily: Peter Thiel and Founders Fund exit ETHZilla, K33 says bitcoin is approaching ‘late bear market territory,’ and more

item.title: Bitcoin 2024 buyers steady BTC price as trader sees $52K 'next week or so'
item.description: Two-year Bitcoin hodlers "absorbed" seller pressure in recent weeks, according to new research, but most analysts still expect new macro BTC price lows.

item.title: Hyperliquid Launches Policy Center With $29 Million Backing to Advocate for DeFi in DC
item.description: The organization is led by industry veteran Jake Chervinsky and backed with $29 million worth of HYPE.

item.title: Coinbase-incubated Base network to ditch Optimism for ‘unified solution’
item.description: The Coinbase-incubated Ethereum Layer 2 is “evolving its foundational software by moving to a unified, Base-operated stack."

item.title: Optimism's OP token falls after Base moves away from the network's 'OP stack' in major tech shift
item.description: Base launched in 2023 and quickly became one of the most widely used Ethereum layer-2 networks.

item.title: Ethereum’s 50% staking milestone triggers backlash over 'misleading' supply data
item.description: CoinShares researcher Luke Nolan says the 50% figure is ‘inaccurate, or at least materially misleading’ and staked ether is closer to 30% of supply. Ethplorer.io’s Aleksandr Vat agrees.

item.title: Bitcoin miner Riot stock jumps nearly 9% as activist Starboard urges AI data center expansion
item.description: The activist investor said Riot's 1.7 GW power capacity can drive premium AI hosting deals at Texas sites.

item.title: Zora débarque sur Solana — Est-ce bientôt la fin de Base ?
item.description: Historiquement implantée sur Base, Zora a finalement choisi Solana (SOL) pour déployer ses nouvelles fonctionnalités. En quoi consistent-elles ? Est-ce un coup dur pour Base ? Nous faisons le point.

item.title: Crypto Long & Short: Crypto’s liquidity mirage
item.description: Crypto Long & Short: Crypto’s liquidity mirage

item.title: Bitcoin : Gagnez du BTC pour le Nouvel An avec Ledger et Le Journal du Coin
item.description: Ledger proposé une offre limitée de 96 heures pour célébrer le Nouvel An chinois, en partenariat exclusif avec le Journal Du Coin.

item.title: Alors que Coinbase déçoit, eToro bondit de 20 % grâce à ses revenus crypto
item.description: Mardi 17 février 2026, l’action eToro (ETOR) a terminé en hausse d’environ 20%, portée par des résultats trimestriels meilleurs qu’attendu et par le poids toujours central de la crypto dans son modèle. Même dans un marché moins euphorique qu’en 2024, Wall Street a aimé le message : eToro gagne de l’argent, et la plateforme reste un carrefour entre crypto et finance traditionnelle.

item.title: Trump family-backed WLFI token surges 23% ahead of Mar-a-Lago crypto forum
item.description: Although US President Donald Trump was not slated to appear at today's event, it will include two senators, the CFTC chair, and industry leaders.

item.title: Jusqu'à 30 000 $ de bonus sur vos dépôts avec Kraken February Deposit Match
item.description: Jusqu'au 9 mars prochain, cumulez les dépôts sur la plateforme de cryptomonnaies Kraken pour recevoir un bonus de 3 %. Quelles sont toutes les informations importantes à savoir pour participer à cette opération exceptionnelle baptisée February Deposit Match ?

item.title: Surendettement chez les jeunes : la Banque de France donne l'alerte
item.description: La Banque de France pointe du doigt une augmentation considérable des dossiers de surendettement chez les jeunes Français… Mais peine à l’expliquer.

item.title: Staking Ethereum : Le nouvel ETF Ethereum de BlackRock fait grincer des dents
item.description: BlackRock vient de lancer un nouvel ETF Ethereum promettant 82 % des revenus de staking aux investisseurs ! Mais derrière ce produit, se cachent des frais élevés et des risques de centralisation qui inquiètent même Vitalik Buterin.

item.title: Bitcoin's plunge signals coming AI crisis, but massive Fed response will drive new record high: Arthur Hayes
item.description: The rise of artificial intelligence is likely to displace millions of workers in quick order, triggering sizable credit defaults, said Hayes.

item.title: Tokenized pre-IPO shares topic ignites legal debate at Consensus Hong Kong 2026
item.description: Ultan Miller touts a blockchain-based pre-IPO index, while critics warn unauthorized equity tokenization risks legal and investor fallout.

item.title: Ethereum : Peter Thiel liquide l’intégralité de sa position dans ETHZilla
item.description: L'investisseur milliardaire Peter Thiel a quitté totalement le capital d'ETHZilla Corp., marquant un tournant critique pour l'entreprise.

item.title: Hyperliquid Foundation sets up DeFi policy advocacy group with $29 million HYPE token donation
item.description: The independent research and advocacy organization will be dedicated to ensuring that DeFi can flourish in the U.S., according to Hyperliquid.

item.title: Les mineurs de BTC ont capitulé ? - Analyse on-chain avec Prof. Chaîne
item.description: Le marché du BTC impose aux mineurs des conditions de rentabilité dégradées, fragilisant progressivement les acteurs les moins résilients et les forçant à débrancher leurs ASICs, voire à vendre des BTC. Tiennent-ils le coup ?

item.title: Brevan Howard crypto fund posts 30% loss in 2025, worst year since launch: FT
item.description: Brevan Howard’s BH Digital Asset fund fell 29.5% in 2025, its worst performance since the crypto-focused fund's 2021 launch.

item.title: Bridge (Stripe) va devenir une « banque fiduciaire nationale » de stablecoins — Voici ce qui va changer
item.description: Bridge, la filiale de Stripe dédiée aux stablecoins, va pouvoir devenir une « banque fiduciaire nationale agréée au niveau fédéral ». Qu'est-ce que cela lui permettra ?

item.title: Bitcoin approaches ‘late bear market territory’ as regime signals echo 2022 bottom, K33 says
item.description: Defensive sentiment, falling leverage, and declining ETF exposure suggest the market may be near a bottom, K33 said.

item.title: How Europe’s blockchain sandbox finds innovation in regulation
item.description: The EU regulated blockchain earlier than most major economies. Its sandbox now tests whether dialogue unlocks innovation inside legal fences.

item.title: American crypto holders are scared and confused about this year’s new IRS tax rules
item.description: Crypto tax platform, Awaken Tax, polled 1,000 crypto holders about a radical shift from self-disclosure to automatic reporting of transactions.

item.title: X rejette les plans de courtage crypto avant le lancement de la fonctionnalité
item.description: La plateforme sociale X d'Elon Musk s'enfonce davantage dans les services financiers avec le lancement prochain des "Smart Cashtags", une fonctionnalité conçue pour améliorer la façon dont les utilisateurs suivent et référencent les actions et les cryptomonnaies. Bien que des rumeurs circulent depuis des mois concernant l'entrée de X dans le domaine du trading, les dirigeants ont clairement indiqué : la plateforme n'exécutera pas les transactions. Elle vise plutôt à améliorer la visibilité des données financières et l'identification des actifs.

item.title: Moonwell hit by $1.78M exploit as AI vibe coding debate reaches DeFi
item.description: The exploit saw the Moonwell protocol exploited for $1.78 million after cbETH was mispriced at $1.12 instead of about $2,200, intensifying debate around AI-co-authored smart contracts.

item.title: WLFI Jumps Double Digits Ahead of Mar-a-Lago 'World Liberty Forum'
item.description: Trump-backed DeFi project World Liberty Financial is up on whale buying and a short squeeze, amid scrutiny over its $500 million UAE deal.

item.title: AMLBot says social engineering drove 65% of crypto cases it probed in 2025
item.description: Social engineering and impersonation-related scams were the most frequent attack vectors targeting crypto investors in AMLBot’s investigations last year.

item.title: While some big investors cash out of crypto, others double down
item.description: Your day-ahead look for Feb. 18, 2026

item.title: ETF Sui avec staking intégré : Grayscale lance une nouvelle crypto sur la bourse de New York
item.description: Grayscale annonce la cotation de son ETF Sui (GSUI) avec staking sur la bourse du NYSE Arca, le premier du genre qui soit au comptant (spot).

item.title: California Begins Enforcing State-Level Crypto Licensing With DFAL
item.description: Crypto firms serving Californians are mandated to secure DFAL licenses or file license applications by mid-2026.

item.title: Amazon (AMZN), Apple (AAPL)... Warren Buffet prend sa retraite et se débarrasse de certaines actions
item.description: Le ponte de la finance Warren Buffet a annoncé sa retraite en fin d'année dernière. Pour son dernier trimestre à Berkshire Hathaway, le PDG a procédé à des ventes notables d'actions. Quelles sont-elles ?

item.title: Bitcoin et IA : Le scénario de crise d’Arthur Hayes pour 2026
item.description: Arthur Hayes déclare que Bitcoin agit comme un « détecteur de fumée » pour une liquidité mondiale en déclin, annonçant une phase de déflation

item.title: Monero résiste aux retraits des exchanges et poursuit son expansion
item.description: Malgré son retrait de nombreuses plateformes, Monero poursuit sa progression. Les transactions restent stables et l’usage sur le darknet explose, confirmant son rôle unique dans la cryptomonnaie axée sur la confidentialité.

item.title: Wells Fargo sees ‘YOLO’ trade driving $150B into Bitcoin and risk assets
item.description: A Wells Fargo strategist said bigger US tax refunds may revive retail risk-taking by late March, potentially sending fresh cash into Bitcoin and momentum stocks.

item.title: Les stablecoins deviennent une réelle option de paiement pour les salaires et les achats du quotidien
item.description: Une récente enquête menée par BVNK, en partenariat avec Coinbase et Artémis, tente de dresser un état des lieux de l’adoption effective des stablecoins comme moyen de paiement de la vie quotidienne. Les résultats montrent une utilisation déjà effective pour le règlement des salaires et les achats de la vie courante.

item.title: Crypto : Le FSB démantèle un réseau de financement terroriste au Daghestan
item.description: Les services de sécurité russes ont procédé à l'arrestation d'un homme soupçonné d'avoir financé le terrorisme via de la crypto.

item.title: Des ETF pour parier sur les élections américaines ? 3 émetteurs sautent le pas
item.description: Entre vendredi et lundi, Bitwise, Roundhill et GranityShares ont déposé à la SEC des dossiers pour des ETF pariant sur les victoires législatives aux États-Unis. Lumière sur ces fonds d'investissement inédits, qui se démarquent par leur originalité.

item.title: Pourquoi le milliardaire Peter Thiel a-t-il vendu toutes ses actions ETHZilla ?
item.description: Un pari qui n’a pas rencontré le succès ? Le milliardaire de la Tech Peter Thiel s’est retiré d’ETHZilla. L’entreprise de trésorerie est en difficulté après des décisions successives surprenantes.

item.title: Bitcoin perd 55 % d’open interest, les traders fuient le levier
item.description: Le bitcoin subit une baisse drastique de l’open interest, signe de fuite du levier et de marchés nerveux. Analyse complète ici.

item.title: Oracle Error Leaves DeFi Lender Moonwell With $1.8 Million in Bad Debt
item.description: The error allowed liquidators to repay roughly $1 of debt to seize cbETH collateral, leaving Moonwell with nearly $1.8 million in bad debt.

item.title: Bitcoin’s tech stock divergence is a ‘fire alarm’ for fiat: Arthur Hayes
item.description: Arthur Hayes warns that AI-related job losses will spark a credit crisis, forcing central banks to print money, which will drive Bitcoin to new all-time highs.

item.title: Bitcoin's Divergence From Nasdaq Is a Warning on Dollar Liquidity: Arthur Hayes
item.description: Arthur Hayes warns Bitcoin's divergence from a flat Nasdaq signals an AI-driven credit crisis, but experts say the timeline is overstretched.

item.title: Crypto lobby forms working group seeking prediction market clarity
item.description: The Prediction Markets Working Group, launched by The Digital Chamber, will champion the sector’s values while advocating for the CFTC to maintain primary oversight.

item.title: Coin Center urges Senate not to axe crypto developer protection bill
item.description: Coin Center said internet and cloud hosting providers aren’t prosecuted when criminals misuse their platforms, arguing crypto developers shouldn’t be either.

item.title: eToro shares pop 20% as crypto revenues bolster Q4 earnings
item.description: eToro CEO Yoni Assia says he is positioning the trading platform “for a financial system that is increasingly moving on-chain,” after its crypto revenues boosted earnings in Q4.

item.title: Why Bitcoin Open Interest Has Seen Its Largest Decline in Almost 3 Years
item.description: Bitcoin open interest has plunged 55% from its October 2025 peak, marking the steepest decline since April 2023 as traders unwind leverage.

item.title: Abu Dhabi Funds Boosted BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Exposure to $1 Billion by End of 2025: Filings
item.description: Abu Dhabi funds added to their Bitcoin exposure in Q4, jumping to more than $1 billion worth of IBIT at the conclusion of the year.

item.title: Bitcoin Miner Bitdeer Overtakes MARA, Establishing Hash Rate Lead: JPMorgan
item.description: Bitcoin miner Bitdeer has overtaken MARA in terms of self-mining hash rate among publicly traded companies, according to JPMorgan analysts.

item.title: Gemini Stock Dives as Winklevoss-Led Crypto Exchange Dumps Executives
item.description: Shares in publicly traded crypto exchange Gemini are plunging as the firm parts ways with three executives following broader layoffs.

item.title: Is the Netherlands Taxing Unrealized Crypto Gains? It's Complicated
item.description: From 2028, the Netherlands will update how tax is calculated on unrealized gains. Crypto critics are in uproar—but the reality is nuanced.

item.title: Strategy’s Bitcoin Buying Accelerates as $48 Billion BTC Stash Sits Underwater
item.description: Strategy reported its fourth-largest Bitcoin purchase of the year, a week after Michael Saylor's defense of the company's became a meme.

item.title: « Peur extrême » : le Crypto Fear and Greed Index touche de plus bas historiques
item.description: Dans le sillage d'une importante chute des prix, le Crypto Fear and Greed Index évolue actuellement sur des niveaux historiquement bas. Zoomons sur cet indicateur, particulièrement révélateur du sentiment des investisseurs.

item.title: ZeroLend Latest DeFi Platform to Shut Down Amid Liquidity, Revenue Pressures
item.description: ZeroLend cited an inability to "generate sustainable revenue" as it became the latest DeFi platform to wind down amid the ongoing slump.

item.title: Le président de la Banque fédérale d'Allemagne encense l'euro numérique et les stablecoins
item.description: Lors d'un discours lundi, Joachim Nagel, le président de la Banque fédérale d'Allemagne, est revenu sur les MNBC et les stablecoins euro. Qu'en dit-il ?

item.title: Kraken Backs 'Trump Accounts' for Wyoming Newborns
item.description: The move reflects a broader effort by crypto firms to lock in regulatory goodwill through long-term political and geographic alignment.

item.title: Bitcoin’s Long-Term Holders Show Signs of Strain After February Sell-Off
item.description: Bitcoin's long-term holders show weakening accumulation, with on-chain data pointing to $54,000 as the next support if $65,000 breaks.

item.title: Philippines' Digital Bank Maya Looks to US Market for Up to $1B IPO
item.description: A U.S. venue could offer deeper capital access as investors weigh the bank’s regulated crypto business against its core banking operations.

item.title: Are we back? Crypto is Green! Solana Intern goes rogue! Pump up 13%! Monero hits another ATH!
item.description: BTC: 95k (+3%) | BTC.D: 59.2% (-0.1%). ETH: 3313 (+6%) | BNB: 936 (+3%) | SOL: 145 (+2%). Top Gainers: IP, ICP, PUMP, PEPE, ENA. BTC ETFs: +$754m | ETH ETFs: +$130m. Crypto rallies on largest ETF inflow in 3 months. Senate committee to vote on crypto bill on Jan 27. Stablecoin issues with bill still being fought over. Ethena Labs makes USDe free from gas fees. Bitdeer overtakes MARA on ‘managed hashrate’. Polygon Labs to buy Coinme, Sequence for $250m. BitPanda eyes Frankfurt IPO in 1H26. CZ invests in perp trading platform Genius Terminal. Coingecko eyes sales at $500m valuation. Russia to open crypto markets more for payments. Crypto wrench attacks continue in France. Pakistan to integrate WLFI’s USD1.

item.title: Pump & Memes HEATING up! XMR vs ZEC! How important are these rate cuts? - Under Exposed
item.description: Crypto majors are green; BTC +1.5% at $92,000; ETH +1% at $3,130, SOL +2% at $142; XRP +1% to $2.06. DASH (+60%), IP (+30%) and XMR (+13%) led top movers; XMR hit another new ATH at $680 (now $640). Gold and Silver hit new ATHs again in the wake of the Powell investigation. The US Senate released the draft Crypto Market Clarity Act, including limits on stablecoin rewards. Senator Warren pressed the SEC over inclusion of crypto in 401ks arguing they expose retirees to too much risk. Vitalik Buterin warned crypto needs better decentralized stablecoins, citing governance capture and inflation risks. World Liberty Financial launched a crypto lending platform built around its USD1 stablecoin, attracting ~$20M. BitGo filed for a U.S. IPO targeting a ~$2B valuation as custody assets surpassed $100B. Tennessee regulators ordered Polymarket, Kalshi, and Crypto.com to halt sports prediction markets and refund users, escalating a multi-state legal fight.

item.title: The ZCash situation explained! Interview with ZEC bull Mert! BTC below $90K! ZEC falls 19%!
item.description: Crypto majors fell again yesterday as btc lost $90k; btc -2% at $89,900; eth -3% at $3,100, sol -3% at $134; xrp -7% to $2.08. Lit (+3%), wlfi (+3%) and xmr (+3%) led top movers. Zec fell 19% after the developer team resigned following a dispute with the board; the team has promised to form a new company and continue the mission. Jpmorgan announced plans to launch its jpm coin on the canton network. Barclays invested in ubyx, a u.S. Stablecoin settlement startup, backing infrastructure that would let regulated institutions move digital money across issuers and wallets. The senate banking committee faces mounting pressure ahead of a key vote on crypto market structure legislation next week. Wyoming introduced its first state-issued stablecoin, frontier stable token, now available to the public. World liberty financial’s subsidiary applied for a national trust bank charter, aiming to issue and custody its usd1 stablecoin under a federally regulated framework. Starknet suffered a multi-hour outage due to a block production bug; the network paused and rolled back before resuming.

item.title: Crypto is Green! Up 6-9%! Memes outperform! Pepe up 67%! Infinex Founder Interview!
item.description: The global crypto market cap hit $3.16t (+1.5%) with majors trading higher; btc +2% at $93,000; eth +1% at $3,175, bnb +2.5% at $906, sol +1% at $135. Virtuals (+24%), render (_17%), btt (+11%) and fet (+11%) led top movers. The btc etfs saw $471m in net inflows on the first trading day of 2026, the highest single-day total since nov 11. Sec commissioner caroline crenshaw officially departed the agency on jan 2nd, leaving behind an all-republican commission. Big 4 firm pwc announced it will go deeper into crypto with a focus on stablecoins and payments.

item.title: Crypto Wallets Can ‘Directly Compete With Neobanks'
item.description: Crypto Wallets Can ‘Directly Compete With Neobanks'
